      • showGameScreen

        public void showGameScreen(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
        Show game screen. Initial View which offers the player various options such as to play a game, view rules, scores and exit the game
        Parameters:
        primaryStage - the primary stage

      • createComputerContent

        public javafx.scene.Parent createComputerContent(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane root)
        Creates the computer content. Creates the battleship grid for the computer
        Returns:
        the parent

      • createPlayerContent

        public javafx.scene.Parent createPlayerContent(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane root)
        Creates the player content.
        Returns:
        the parent

      • shotCellvisited

        public boolean shotCellvisited()
        This method implements the AI functionality for the computer turn. It checks if one cell has already been shot for a ship but the ship is not completely destroyed then search for the neighbouring cells.

      • startTimer

        public void startTimer()
        This is the global game timer method. It will be reset when a new game session is created either by pressing the retry button or the quit button.

      • startTimer2

        public void startTimer2()
        This is the local player timer method. It will be reset when the player has taked its turn and it is a miss and the next turn is of the other player/computer.

      • resetPlayerGlobalTime

        public void resetPlayerGlobalTime()
        Resets the player global timer variable which stores the total time taken by the player in the entire game session.

      • returnToGame

        public void returnToGame()
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Return to game. Takes back to the main screen if the player wishes to abort the current game session
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

      • restartGameScreen

        public void restartGameScreen()
        Restart game screen. Resets to the empty scene so that other scenes can be implemented to get desired output.

      • resetGlobalVars

        public void resetGlobalVars()
        Reset global vars. So that a new game can be started

      • getPrimaryStage

        public javafx.stage.Stage getPrimaryStage()
        Gets the primary stage.
        Returns:
        the primary stage

        public void setPrimaryStage(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
        Sets the primary stage.
        Parameters:
        primaryStage - the new primary stage

      • shootCells

        public boolean shootCells(Board.Cell cell,
                          Board board)
        Checks if a ship was shot in the previous run. If the cell was shot then the computer will look for the neighbouring cells to shoot.

      • shootNeighbours

        public boolean shootNeighbours(Board.Cell cell,
                               Board board,
                               java.util.Deque<Board.Cell> shotCellStack)
        This method checks if the neighbouring cells of the previously shot cell(of the player ship) belong to the ship and shoots the cell
